author: MARI YAMAGUCHI
title: Japan's Abe slammed over 'stay home' coronavirus tweet
description: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is being slammed over his "stay at home" coronavirus tweet.
content:
TOKYO Get all the latest news on coronavirus and more delivered daily to your inbox. Sign up here.
Perhaps the best that can be said about a “stay home" tweet from Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe is that it’s given bored copycats sitting at home waiting o… [+5557 chars]
